Text:
Don't you people fucking learn that magnet downloading is unsure??? Even if my client is up to date there's no guarantee that it will work. Why?
1. If I'm using a different client there's a lower compabillity.
2. Main reason - If I'm in a different country there's a super low chance for the magnet download to work.
And of course it's a blank torrent for me. With nothing inside a.k.a it's NOT WORKING!

@shred.

Lol! magnet links works like a charm here XD

Cry everyone a river Blood_shred.

They might not be as good as torrent files when you need to connect; but other than one taking about 20 minutes to connect, i've had no real issue. Though i'd like to be able to select what i want to download before i start downloading...
